import React, {useState} from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPen, faTrashCan } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export const Todo = ({task, toggleComplete, deleteTodo, editTodo}) => { const { isModalOpen, isModalClose } = useState({}) return (
toggleComplete(task.id)} className={`${task.completed ? 'completed' : ""}`} />

{task.task}

) }
